name: R20 Regions of Climate Action
goal: R20 is an NGO founded by A. Schwarzenegger with sub-national governments in collaboration with the UN. The purpose is to facilitate climate change solutions by helping cities and regions to implement low carbon economic development projects in partnership on the one hand with companies which have the technologies and related services and on the other hands with investors be public (development banks, bilateral and intergovernmental agencies, sovereign funds)  or private (private equities, pension funds, family office…).
euInitiatives:
Réduction des émissions de gaz à effet de serre.
Bas Carbone.
Transition énergétique.
Traitement des déchets.
Transformation des déchets en énergie ...
